channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rare Earth Stocks Surge On JPMorgan’s $1.5 Trillion U.S. Investment Pledge
item.description: The bank said it will make direct equity and venture investments of up to $10 billion in select companies in the new initiative.

item.title: NYT Connections Hints Today: Tuesday, October 14 Clues And Answers (#856)
item.description: Looking for today's NYT Connections hints? Some help and the answers for today's game are right here to help keep your streak alive.

item.title: Can Direct Air Capture Survive This Moment?

item.title: iOS 26.0.2—What’s In Apple’s Imminent New iPhone Update?
item.description: Apple’s iOS 26.0.2 is coming soon, according to a report. What, exactly, could be in Apple's mystery new iPhone update and when will it arrive?

item.title: I Have An Admittedly Ridiculous Idea To Save ‘Destiny 2’
item.description: Destiny 2 has many problems currently, but the main one is what content players can play during its "dead time." Here's a goofy idea.
